DOC.brief_title: Health Effects CLA Versus Industrial Trans Fatty Acids
DOC.detailed_description: It double-blind randomized multiple cross-over trial 3 treatment : - CLA ; - Industrial trans fatty acid ( positive control ) ; - Oleic acid ( Cis 18:1 , monounsaturated fatty acid unhydrogenated vegetable oil ) reference fat . Each volunteer receive diet three week , random order , total 9 week . Three week sufficient reach new stable lipoprotein level .
DOC.criteria: age 1865 year healthy serum total cholesterol > = 6,5 mmol/L serum triglyceride > 2,3 mmol/L chronic disease ( diabetes , cardiovascular disease , kidney liver dysfunction ) use cholesterol lower medication use blood pressure lower medication high alcohol intake BMI > 30 pregnant lactation woman unusual dietary requirement
